name: Alone Demo
description:
ALONE - A Cerebral Horror Game

Do you remember me?

Visit our website:

http://true-nightmare.com/alonehome.html

Alone is a first-person, mystery, horror game. Your goal is to remember WHO YOU ARE. You're inside an abandoned house haunted by a demon who preys on people’s darkest secrets. Your only ally is a mysterious floating rabbit who seems to remember you. Using only a flashlight you must keep the demon at bay while you search for clues about your past. But be on your guard. The secrets you keep mean the demon is always close at hand. Can you survive long enough to discover the real you?

Meet Eayan

Meet Eayan, a curious demon who hunts for dark secrets. He lives off the energy of those with something to hide. And for some reason, he's hunting you. He may seem passive at first but be careful. His behavior changes once he knows he can reach you. The only thing he can’t stand is the light. Can you avoid him long enough to learn the truth about yourself? Use your hearing to find where he is before he finds you. If you leave him alone for too long then you may have a new unwelcomed guest inside your house.

Listen to the first 2 minutes of Alone!

Can you find the alternative ending?

It does exist, we promise
